title: Nez Perce National Historical Park: Nearby Attractions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Nearby Attractions              Nearby Attractions      Since the Nez Perce National Historical Park has thirty-eight sites spread across four states, there are other attractions that are in close proximity to park sites. Some of the high points include: U.S. Forest Service  Clearwater National Forest Orofino, Idaho (208) 476-4541 Nez Perce National Forest Grangeville, Idaho (208) 983-1950  Nez Perce (Nee-Me-Poo) National Historical Trail Oregon, Idaho, Montana, Oklahoma Headquarters: Orofino, Idaho (208) 476-8227  Corps of Engineers  Dworshak Reservoir Ahsahka, Idaho (208) 476-1255  State Parks  Hells Gate State Park Lewiston, Idaho (208) 799-5015  Winchester State Park Winchester, Idaho (208) 924-7563  Dworshak State Park Orofino, Idaho (208) 476-5994 Museums  Appaloosa Museum Moscow, Idaho (208) 882-5578 Bicentennial Museum Grangeville, Idaho (208) 983-2104 Lewis-Clark State College Center For Arts and History Lewiston, Idaho (208) 792-2243 Historical Museum at St. Gertrude Cottonwood, Idaho (208) 962-7123
